alert.note: Alert for Kohala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 25 at 3:25PM HST until November 26 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND THROUGH 6 PM HST SATURDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND THROUGH 6 PM HST SATURDAY... .A large north-northeast (010-040 degrees) swell will build tonight into Saturday, then steadily diminish Saturday night and Sunday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Surf of 7 to 10 feet. * WHERE...West facing shores of the Big Island, namely the Kua Bay area. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
